description: This file defines a module that provides computed property functionality for dojo/Stateful objects, including watching properties, computing derived values, and managing dependencies.

methods.name: watch
methods.description: Sets up a watch on a dojo/Stateful property, invoking callback on changes.

methods.name: getProps
methods.description: Retrieves property values from a list of dojo/Stateful objects.

methods.name: removeHandles
methods.description: Removes an array of handles by calling their remove method.

methods.name: computed
methods.description: Main function that creates a computed property on a dojo/Stateful object, managing dependencies and updates.
